title: Episode 208 - Logan Sankey Interview
itunes:title: Episode 208 - Logan Sankey Interview
description: It's a return to ski jumping today as we sit down and chat with upcoming American ski jumper Logan Sankey about the incredible sport and learn more about her chances to compete in Beijing! We find out just why she switched from Alpine Skiing to Ski Jumping and how a crossover between the two sports helped her along the way. We also learn more about the fear aspect of the sport and how that is able to be used to her advantage. Added to this we find out just what path she will need to take to get her to Beijing and just how good she is at naming capital cities. It's a fun chat that you will love, so get to listening!
